name: MySalesReportfromQuickBooks
0:
”Alexa, open My Sales Report”
”Alexa, launch My Sales Report”
”Alexa, load My Sales Report”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my sales report
des:
My Sales Report tells you all your important information stored on QuickBooks. It will help you to know what is the performance of your Business.

With My Sales Report, you can now know how was your sales yesterday, last week, last month, last year or since the beginning.


How to use "My Sales Report from QuickBooks"?

For the very first time, you need to connect your QuickBooks account with this skill. There is two ways to connect your QuickBooks account:
- There is "Link Account" button in the skill page
- There is an "Account Linking" card sent to your Alexa App after launching My Sales Report for the first time.

Then, you can say:
- "Alexa, open My Sales Report"
- "Alexa, start My Sales Report"
- "Alexa, play My Sales Report"

After launching the skill, you can say the following:
- run all dates
- run my today sales report
- run my yesterday sales report
- run my this week sales report
- run my last week sales report
- run my this month sales report
- run my last month sales report
- run my this year sales report
- run my last year sales report

Or for shortcut, you can say:
- run all
- run today
- run yesterday
- run this week
- etc.

How to support us?

Your review is extremely important and it shows us your support. Please consider leaving a review if you love the skill. Your review encourages us to continue making more skills.


----CREDITS----

This Skill is not created by, affiliated with, or supported by QuickBooks.
